server.server_explanation: You need to specify some data for the broker to be able to.run. At the moment you only need to specify the port number. In the future more options will be available

data.data_explanation: Add users with their passwords here. Use the Delete Data button to remove all user data.
data.data_purge_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete all data?

messages.unable_set_settings: There was an error trying to apply the settings.
messages.settings_unexpectedError: Unexpected error occured. Please try again
